Question.Subject: When I close one internet Explorer Window all the other open IE Windows get Closed !?
Question.Content: Hi,I have IE8 ,when in Tabbed Browsing if I close one IE Tab,the whole window get Closed.I removed IE8 from My machine and installed IE6.Same problen persists,if I close one window all other get Closed.Please repond Immediately !
Question.ChosenAnswer: Well just try another browser like opera, google chrome, safari, mozilla firefox , netscap navigator IE has always been in my black list. Have fun. SHAUN crazybrain.biz.tc

Answer.Content: Well just try another browser like opera, google chrome, safari, mozilla firefox , netscap navigator IE has always been in my black list. Have fun. SHAUN crazybrain.biz.tc
